data.quote: My dad is the nicest guy you'll ever meet, and the easiest going.
data.author: Serena Williams

data.quote: Feels good to try, but playing a father, I'm getting a little older. I see now that I'm taking it more serious and I do want that lifestyle.
data.author: Adam Sandler

data.quote: My dad was a roofer when I was young. I believe he owned his own roofing company in Florida. And then he fell through a roof, broke his back. Permanently. I mean, he's not paralyzed or anything, but he's had to deal with pain for all of his life since then.
data.author: Channing Tatum

data.quote: We came to Portland because there was a good alternative public school. Friends who lived there told me about it, and my son loved it. I left his dad and went to work slinging hash in a breakfast diner and working nights tending bar in a biker tavern.
data.author: Katherine Dunn

data.quote: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship.
data.author: Harrison Ford

data.quote: I wanted to be a forest ranger or a coal man. At a very early age, I knew I didn't want to do what my dad did, which was work in an office.
data.author: Harrison Ford

data.quote: When I was little, we had a Golden Book that had all these Disney characters in one portrait on the first page. My dad used to read from it every night. We'd play this game of find Pluto or find Donald Duck. He'd read us stories and do all the voices. Those are great memories.
data.author: Danica McKellar

data.quote: But I honestly don't read critics. My dad reads absolutely everything ever written about me. He calls me up to read ecstatic reviews, but I always insist that I can't hear them. If you give value to the good reviews, you have to give value to the criticism.
data.author: Fiona Apple

data.quote: I grew up with a truck. My dad had one, so I like trucks.
data.author: Lucas Till

data.quote: I have four shelves covered with journals that I've written. Dad and I are writing songs together. I've probably written 100 songs.
data.author: Miley Cyrus

data.quote: My parents are very hard working people who did everything they could for their children. I have two brothers and they worked dog hard to give us an education and provide us with the most comfortable life possible. My dad provided for his family daily. So, yes, that is definitely in my DNA.
data.author: David Oyelowo

data.quote: My father, he was like the rock, the guy you went to with every problem.
data.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

data.quote: I feel my dad, I still feel his love, and I still love him. I would do anything to have him back, but half the reason that my life is good, has real, true value, is that he died. I would obviously rather have him alive, but he gave me so much in his death.
data.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

data.quote: I want to be a dad. That's floating to the top of my list. I think it's such an important thing. I'm at the age where everyone has kids, and I ask them, 'Is it like a puppy?' And they go, 'It's 10 times a puppy.'
data.author: Jimmy Fallon

data.quote: An angry father is most cruel towards himself.
data.author: Publilius Syrus

data.quote: I want my kids to see me as Dad, for God's sake, not a television personality.
data.author: Gordon Ramsay

data.quote: I think some of my darkness comes from my dad. There is definitely convict history on that side of the family, a lot of dodginess. But with the darkness can also come entrepreneurialism, genius traits.
data.author: Rebel Wilson

data.quote: My dad worked two jobs and moved us to the suburbs, and just being a black person, I went through a lot of racism and being called names and being bullied every single day. And it was hard. I didn't have any friends.
data.author: Sherri Shepherd

data.quote: A dramatic thing, the first time you stand up to your dad.
data.author: Lenny Kravitz

data.quote: My dad was diagnosed with cancer, so we ended up burying him a year to the day that he was diagnosed.
data.author: Seann William Scott

data.quote: Child-rearing is my main interest now. I'm a hands-on father.
data.author: Sean Penn

data.quote: I'm an ambassador for the Make-A-Wish Foundation, and one of the children, his wish was to go to the Emmys, so he's going to be my date, along with my husband, and my dad and his girlfriend. So we're going to have a really fun night and it's going to be really exciting. I'm really excited for him to experience that.
data.author: Christina Hendricks

data.quote: My dad studies and practices homeopathy and Ayurveda medicine. He's a strong believer in both honey and milk as forms of healing. Honey is the one food that does not die. It does not expire. Growing up, he'd always be mixing up almonds or turmeric or gram flower with milk to cure a cough or a cold.
data.author: Rupi Kaur

data.quote: I was always embarrassed because my dad wore a suit and my mother wore flat pumps and a cozy jumper while my friends' parents were punks or hippies.
data.author: Shirley Manson

data.quote: 'Dirt On My Boots' is a very different song. I heard the melody, and I heard the lyrics, and I heard the drive of that song. I totally related. It was kinda me when I was on my bulldozer working for my dad.
data.author: Jon Pardi

data.quote: My dad was in the military, yeah. He was in the Air Force, and he was a doctor, so he would go places for six months here, and two years there. And I was home-schooled because I played the violin, and I did a lot of competitions.
data.author: Felicia Day

data.quote: When I turned 11, my dad decorated a room at the Standard hotel in Los Angeles in a '60s, Austin Powers style. There was human bowling: You run inside a giant inflatable ball and try to knock down pins. To this day, adults say it was one of the craziest parties they've ever been to.
data.author: Zoe Kravitz

data.quote: I mean, my dad's a television producer, and I knew I could get a job as an assistant or a reader with one of his friends, but it wasn't exactly what I wanted to do.
data.author: J. J. Abrams

data.quote: Mum and Dad sent us to a bilingual school, so we had half the lessons in English and half in French. But I remember being hugely lost.
data.author: Rose Leslie

data.quote: We were brought up Protestant, and I went to church three times a day on a Sunday. My parents weren't Bible-bashers, but we all have a strong belief in God and a strong faith. We had a huge garden; our house was a bit like a scene from 'The Good Life.' I think Mam and Dad had it really hard, bringing up a big family on very little.
data.author: Bonnie Tyler

data.quote: My father... had sharper eyes than the rest of our people.
data.author: Chief Joseph

data.quote: I said something really stupid once. I told a friend that my mother was so beautiful, but my dad was ugly. My dad heard it and just laughed it off, but I felt guilty. It haunted me for years. I should never have said that.
data.author: Gene Wilder

data.quote: They have had such a crazy life living with me as their dad. Not crazy but different from their friends.
data.author: Sebastian Bach

data.quote: Honestly, I was such a tomboy as a kid. People were taking from their mothers' closets - I was taking from my dad's closet. It was the '80s, so it wasn't terrible, but I was wearing my dad's dress shirts over jeans from the Gap.
data.author: Lauren Graham

data.quote: I pop gum. My parents get so annoyed with me. I know my dad wishes he never taught me how to do that.
data.author: Hilary Duff

data.quote: I watch political shows for a number of weeks in a row, and all I see are guys arguing with each other over issues I have no idea about. My brother, he loves war-torn places. My dad would always read the paper and tell me I should watch CNN, but I usually wind up watching 'Breaking Bad.'
data.author: Norm MacDonald

data.quote: My girls are great at making fun of Dad. They're never impressed with anything I do. I love that. I hope that never changes.
data.author: Alex Rodriguez

data.quote: My dad took me for an audition once, to show me, 'OK, you want to be a child actor, this is what it's like.' I sang a folk song about donkeys on this West End stage with this big director, and there was a queue of 200 girls all singing 'Memory.' I was terrible. Terrible.
data.author: Emilia Clarke

data.quote: My dad wanted to name me after Rainier Maria Rilke, the poet.
data.author: Rainn Wilson

data.quote: The entertainment industry isn't a line of work encouraged in the Persian culture. When I called my dad to say I wanted to quit medicine, there was about three minutes of silence. I'm not sure he knew what to do with himself!
data.author: Nazanin Boniadi

data.quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful.
data.author: Cindy Crawford

data.quote: My dad works in child protection and he's spent many, many years in that line of work.
data.author: Chris Hemsworth

data.quote: My dad talks about the times when we'd play backyard cricket: If I got bowled out, I'd just refuse to let go of the bat and swing it at anyone who tried to take it away from me. I like to think that's been tempered a bit over the years.
data.author: Chris Hemsworth

data.quote: My dad shaped the footballing side of me, and Mum shaped me as a person. I've always been very close to her - we've only ever had one argument, and that was over something stupid when I was 13.
data.author: Frank Lampard

data.quote: I went to my dad when I was 17 and said, 'I want to be a country music star.' Which every dad loves to hear. And he said, 'I want you to go to college.' So we had a discussion. And I'm pretty stubborn. I'm a lot like him. And he said, 'If you go to college and graduate, I'll pay your first six months of rent in Nashville.' So he bribed me.
data.author: Eric Church

data.quote: You can't be the dad who takes your kid out after your wife has said, 'No ice cream,' buys the ice cream, and says, 'Don't tell your mother.' You teach the child to lie - and to disrespect the other parent.
data.author: Howie Mandel

data.quote: And my dad drilled it in my head, you know, 'If you want it bad enough, and you're willing to make the sacrifices, you can do it. But first you have to believe in yourself.
data.author: Jennie Finch

data.quote: So my father was a person who never lied to me. If I had a question, he answered it. I knew a lot of things at a young age because I was intrigued.
data.author: Nick Cannon

data.quote: My dad was the town drunk. Most of the time that's not so bad but New York City?
data.author: Henny Youngman

data.quote: My dad was my hero when I was a young boy. And then it's a toss-up between Han Solo, the New Zealand All Blacks Rugby team, and Marlon Brando.
data.author: Martin Henderson

data.quote: There's a lot of research behind the scenes that you don't get to see, but I have an instinct that my dad nurtured from when I was born. I was very lucky then.
data.author: Steve Irwin

data.quote: When I was little, I grew up in a place called Hertfordshire, which is just near London, but out in the country, and I visited Pakistan in the summers to go and see my family on my dad's side.
data.author: Bat for Lashes

data.quote: My dad used to draw these great cartoon figures. His dream was being a cartoonist, but he never achieved it, and it kind of broke my heart. I think part of my interest in art had to do with his yearning for something he could never have.
data.author: Kathryn Bigelow

data.quote: When we used to go to the car-wash where people would wipe the windows, my dad would go out and help them and then tip them as well, so I learned my empathy from my dad, and my mum is very empathetic too, but in a very stern way; she will always check my ego.
data.author: Charlie Puth

data.quote: The surprising thing about fatherhood was finding my inner mush. Now I want to share it with the world.
data.author: Christopher Meloni

data.quote: To do a movie with someone like Tom Hanks that when you tell your dad, your dad knows who Tom Hanks is - it feels like you're finally giving back to your parents. It's like you've actually done something that they can recognize, and there's something in me that makes them super proud.
data.author: Sarita Choudhury

data.quote: My dad was in the army. World War II. He got his college education from the army. After World War II he became an insurance salesman. Really, I didn't know my dad very well. He and my mother split up after the war. I was raised by my maternal grandmother and grandfather, and by my mother.
data.author: Al Pacino

data.quote: I'm a father. It isn't just my life any more. I don't want my kid finding bottles in the house or seeing his father completely smashed.
data.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

data.quote: My dad always told me, 'I don't care what you do. Just aim to be the best at it. Even if it's the world's best window cleaner.'
data.author: Bruce Dickinson

data.quote: I used to have a silk dressing gown an uncle bought in Japan and when I came downstairs in it, my dad used to call me Davinia. There was never embarrassment about that kind of thing. My sister used to dress me up a lot. She thought I was a little doll.
data.author: David Walliams

data.quote: I loved going to the Chiang Kai Shek Memorial in Taipei to watch all the old Chinese people doing tai chi and practicing kung fu. The monument was made of white marble, and it was beautiful. Sometimes my dad and I would practice with them.
data.author: Jimmy Chin

data.quote: The whole thing for me is that I did 'Full House' and 'America's Funniest Home Videos,' and I look like a dentist, and I'm a dad. Being known as a dirty comedian turned into this weird thing. It's people's image of me.
data.author: Bob Saget

data.quote: My dad always jokes that we should have a reality TV show because my friends and I pull crazy stunts, like putting Saran Wrap on the toilet.
data.author: Sofia Richie

data.quote: I grew up watching my dad be a singer, so it's something I've always been interested in.
data.author: Sofia Richie

data.quote: I like all the angels around because they protect me and my daughter. I mean, her Dad's an angel.
data.author: Courtney Love

data.quote: My father never raised his hand to any one of his children, except in self-defense.
data.author: Fred Allen

data.quote: My dad is so unique in what he does. It's not like I'm taking a torch from him and doing his thing. I hope I've carried from him a little bit of a sense of irony, a little bit of a wink.
data.author: Willie Geist

data.quote: My dad said if you become a tennis professional just make sure you get into the top hundred, because you have to make a little bit of money. You make a living so you can pay your coaching and, you know, your travels.
data.author: Roger Federer

data.quote: All of my high school male teachers were WWII and/or Korean War veterans. They taught my brothers and me the value of service to our country and reinforced what our dad had shown us about the meaning of service.
data.author: Oliver North

data.quote: My dad is really just lazy. He has nothing, I feel, to offer this world.
data.author: Sasha Grey

data.quote: La Mancha is a very macho, chauvinistic society. I saw very clearly that my life had to be in Madrid, and I liberated myself from my mum and dad after high school.
data.author: Pedro Almodovar

data.quote: It is impossible to please all the world and one's father.
data.author: Jean de La Fontaine

data.quote: I've had some amazing people in my life. Look at my father - he came from a small fishing village of five hundred people and at six foot four with giant ears and a kind of very odd expression, thought he could be a movie star. So go figure, you know?
data.author: Kiefer Sutherland

data.quote: Between Prince and my dad's fusion-jazz records, I didn't have a choice in being funky.
data.author: Patrick Stump

data.quote: I look for strong people. I don't like people who'll say yes to everything I might bring up. I want people who can argue and disagree and have a point of view that's reflected in the magazine. My dad believed in the cult of personality. He brought great writers and columnists to 'The Standard.'
data.author: Anna Wintour

data.quote: My dad would call me his Cuban princess because I had really dark olive skin because I was always in the sun; but I don't really go in the sun anymore, so that is why I am so white.
data.author: Bella Thorne

data.quote: I don't think I have any guilt or embarrassment about any of the TV shows I watch. Maybe the fact that the shows I can watch over and over again are cartoons like 'Bob's Burgers' and 'American Dad' and 'Rick & Morty.'
data.author: Ross Butler

data.quote: Sometimes, being a single mother, I miss the freedom. I see my other friends with kids, and when they go out for a drink, it is the dad that stays in.
data.author: Julia Restoin Roitfeld

data.quote: I'm going to take care of the man I'm with. I grew up in a household where my mum takes care of my dad - she cooks, she does everything - and that's the kind of girl I am.
data.author: Nicole Scherzinger

data.quote: My dad and uncles were among the 125,000 proud black American volunteers who, throughout their entire lives, considered their decision to serve during WWII as their greatest honor.
data.author: Burgess Owens

data.quote: My dad always taught me to never be satisfied, to want more and know that what is done is done.
data.author: Thierry Henry

data.quote: To say that my dad pushed me is an understatement. I was never naturally drawn to football.
data.author: Thierry Henry

data.quote: I never saw my dad cry. My son saw me cry. My dad never told me he loved me, and consequently I told Scott I loved him every other minute. The point is, I'll make less mistakes than my dad, my sons hopefully will make less mistakes than me, and their sons will make less mistakes than their dads.
data.author: James Caan

data.quote: I've always liked telling stories. That probably came from my dad, who definitely had the gift of gab and who wove a kind of personal folklore about his youth - stories full of adventure and ghosts and wild antics.
data.author: Cullen Bunn

data.quote: I would never have done what I'd done if I'd considered my father as somebody I wanted to please.
data.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

data.quote: People who have not done their research on me do not know that I am European, born in Copenhagen, Denmark to an Italian father from Napoli and a mother from Alabama who was singing opera and went to Europe, met my dad, fell in love, and then moved back to Rome, where I was raised, between Rome and Hamburg.
data.author: Giancarlo Esposito

data.quote: My parents have a ridiculous work ethic; my dad just works, works, works, works, works. I think it would be hard to find a guy who's logged more hours than that guy.
data.author: Bill Burr

data.quote: When I was a boy, I used to pull a big cross saw with my dad. He'd use his right hand, so I'd have to use my left.
data.author: Joe Frazier

data.quote: When I was a teenager, I was an umpire for a competitive league for 8- to 9-year-olds. I was really bad at it because I didn't know all the rules, and all these kids were better athletes than me. I made a bad call, and this dad snapped on me. Then he dumped his trash from his cooler, and I had to kick him out of the stands.
data.author: Adam DeVine

data.quote: If I took the 40 years of my dad talking to me about war and battles and taking me to battlefields and distilled it down into one question, it would probably be the idea of the necessary or unnecessary war.
data.author: Suzanne Collins

data.quote: What harsh judges fathers are to all young men!
data.author: Terence

data.quote: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
data.author: James Levine

data.quote: These things were happening in my life where I was like, 'Man, I wish my pops was here to see this.' I never had those thoughts before fame, when my life was just a regular life. I wasn't saying, 'I wish my dad could be around and see me working at Applebee's.'
data.author: Kid Cudi

data.quote: My dad was an attorney. The last thing he ever thought about was clothes, and yet somehow he always looked good.
data.author: Thom Browne

data.quote: I was going to move to New York after college and had no interest in pilot season. I'd seen what happened on TV shows because of my dad, and I didn't want to open myself up to that. But 'Pretty Little Liars' had a very early audition, and my agents encouraged me to go even though I didn't think it would be my thing.
data.author: Troian Bellisario

data.quote: I like wearing my dad's sweaters because I knew that he wore them when he held me when I was a baby.
data.author: Troian Bellisario

data.quote: My Dad was my biggest supporter. He never put pressure on me.
data.author: Bobby Orr

data.quote: I just went off for two months traveling around Europe on a motorcycle and pretty much turned my phone off. I did 5,000 miles with my dad. We went through Holland, Germany, Austria, Slovenia, Croatia, Bosnia, Montenegro, Italy... and then I did Spain and France by myself.
data.author: Michael Fassbender

data.quote: All I want to do is be a good dad, but I'm pretty bad at it.
data.author: Jim Gaffigan

data.quote: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out.
data.author: Jay London

data.quote: My dad used to tell me, 'Look, son, opportunity does not come knocking.' It's usually running down the street, and you have to chase it down, you have to tackle it, and then you have to hang on to it.
data.author: David A. Clarke, Jr.

data.quote: Since I stayed in a colony where either one was an engineer or a scientist, everybody thought I would be a scientist. This was the expectation everybody had apart from my parents. Honestly, I, too, wanted to be a scientist. I think it was the way Dad would explain us scientific theories and concepts that made the subject more intriguing.
data.author: Shreya Ghoshal

data.quote: One of my earliest memories is of my father carrying me in one arm with a picket sign in the other.
data.author: Camryn Manheim

data.quote: Dad was the only adult male I ever trusted.
data.author: Michael Reagan

data.quote: Because of my father, we are that Shining City on a Hill.
data.author: Michael Reagan

data.quote: I have always thought of Walt Disney as my second father.
data.author: Annette Funicello

data.quote: Aeneas carried his aged father on his back from the ruins of Troy and so do we all, whether we like it or not, perhaps even if we have never known them.
data.author: Angela Carter

data.quote: No, I never thought about my father's money as my money.
data.author: Christie Hefner

data.quote: My father loved people, children and pets.
data.author: Tony Visconti

data.quote: I was born and brought up in Liverpool with my clever little sister Jemma, who is 14 and wants to be a vet. My mum Jane is an administrator and my dad Peter is a taxi driver.
data.author: Jennifer Ellison

data.quote: My father wouldn't get us a TV, he wouldn't allow a TV in the house.
data.author: Janis Joplin

data.quote: I grew up in Greenwich Village. Dad was friends with John Lennon and Yoko Ono.
data.author: Yancy Butler

data.quote: I'm glad to have shown myself able to do other things rather than people thinking, 'Oh, he'll just do the same as his dad.' Dad was a brilliant actor, but it just so happened he was five foot five and a half, fat and bald.
data.author: Rory Kinnear

data.quote: I lost my dad way too early and it was agonisingly awful. I missed him so much and I hated knowing that I could never again pick up the phone to tell him about my day.
data.author: Monica Seles

data.quote: I grew up not liking my father very much. I never saw him cry. But he must have. Everybody cries.
data.author: Charley Pride

data.quote: I wanted my dad to be proud of me, and I fell into acting because there wasn't anything else I could do, and in it I found a discipline that I wanted to keep coming back to, that I love and I learn about every day.
data.author: Tom Hardy

data.quote: I was always the new kid in school, I'm the kid from a broken family, I'm the kid who had no dad showing up at the father-son stuff, I'm the kid that was using food stamps at the grocery store.
data.author: Dave Mustaine

data.quote: My father taught me how to substitute realities.
data.author: Mira Sorvino

data.quote: When I was younger it was - you know, my dad dressed up in drag on 'Bosom Buddies.' And that was what I was having to deal with at the time. And then around the time that I was into college was when he became statue-worthy I guess you could say.
data.author: Colin Hanks

data.quote: My dad is a much more flamboyant character than I am. I think that's why I couldn't see myself going into straight acting. I always just felt daft.
data.author: Nina Conti

data.quote: The script for 'In Good Company' was the first one I ever showed my dad.
data.author: Topher Grace

data.quote: Creativity runs across many categories in life, from the arts-and-crafts project a mum or dad does with their kids, to the bestselling author's manuscript, to the designs of the hairdresser, to the creations of the computer programming genius.
data.author: Tabatha Coffey

data.quote: I didn't always want to be a dad.
data.author: Liam Gallagher

data.quote: I had to learn how to chop wood actually - I don't think my dad would have let me go chop wood in the backyard growing up.
data.author: Jennifer Lawrence

data.quote: Can I play a southern character? You betcha. Can I do the voice of Tourist Dad and Carnival Barker? Ya betcha. Can I do Fix-It Felix? Ya betcha. But I don't want to just play southern characters, so I hide it; I bury it. I tamp it down like a secret. Like a dirty little secret.
data.author: Rob Huebel

data.quote: I'm being a dad and a good husband.
data.author: Chad Smith

data.quote: I'm a fun father, but not a good father. The hard decisions always went to my wife.
data.author: John Lithgow

data.quote: When it came to the stylish and graceful art of ballroom dancing, my dad was a king of the clubs, a prowling tiger and a wonderfully natural mover.
data.author: Bruno Tonioli

data.quote: My dad is a huge rock and roll lead guitar fan. I didn't even really know that until recently. Everything has to have a guitar solo in it.
data.author: Slash

data.quote: My dad taught me true words you have to use in every relationship. Yes, baby.
data.author: Star Jones

data.quote: My father was the most rational and the most dispassionate of men.
data.author: Simon Newcomb

data.quote: I'm sure there was some part of his soul was intrinsically happy, but he probably had to go through some permutations to really get that to blossom. I'm sure Dad had his challenges, but I think that joy was there from the beginning and he had to find a way to make his life support that and express that.
data.author: Jennifer Grant

data.quote: I remember going on carriage rides with Dad when we'd visit. I think quiet L.A. suited him better, but he loved to see shows here, he loved to visit his friends in the Hamptons.
data.author: Jennifer Grant

data.quote: My brothers bullied me, so I cried a lot as a kid. It was the only defense I had. Telling them to stop wouldn't work. The crying would bring my dad. Dad was my cavalry.
data.author: Steven Adams

data.quote: But you know, my dad called me the laziest white kid he ever met. When I screamed back at him that he was putting down a race of people to call me lazy, his answer was that's not what he was doing, and that I was also the dumbest white kid he ever met.
data.author: Norman Lear

data.quote: I'm Bam Margera. And I feel like kicking my dad's butt all day today.
data.author: Bam Margera

data.quote: When you grow up on a dairy farm, cows don't take a day off. So you work every day and my dad always said, 'No one can outwork you.'
data.author: Pat Summitt

data.quote: I haven't really decided to be an actor yet! I started doing plays when I was about 15 or 16. I only did it because my dad saw a bunch of pretty girls in a restaurant and he asked them where they came from and they said drama group. He said, 'Son, that is where you need to go.'
data.author: Robert Pattinson

data.quote: And in that time, I lost my dad and had kids of my own. It was like, OK, I get it now. I know what fatherhood is all about. And you look at your parents differently.
data.author: Paul Reiser

data.quote: I look at my little girl and I wonder what she's going to be and what she's going to do and what is it that leads girls certain directions in life. I think a lot of that goes back to what kind of father they had, and so it makes me want to be the best dad I can possibly be.
data.author: Jake Owen

data.quote: As a little girl I used to daydream about my real father coming on a white horse to rescue me.
data.author: Christine Keeler

data.quote: I could share an hour of warm camaraderie with Dad, then once I'd walked out the door, get the uncanny feeling I'd disappeared into the wings of his mind's stage, like a character no longer necessary to the ongoing story line.
data.author: Ron Reagan

data.quote: Roman history was kind of unavoidable where I was growing up. It was everywhere - all the place names and ruins and forts. My dad's a history buff, and I spent a lot of time on Hadrian's Wall. I became fascinated by the idea of what was so terrifying up there that the Romans built a 60-mile long, 30ft high stone wall to keep it out?
data.author: Neil Marshall

data.quote: I was the third son, and the family tradition was my dad always favored the oldest child.
data.author: Fred Korematsu

data.quote: Thirteen, 13 children, and I love - I love them all. And I think I've been a good father to all of them.
data.author: Anthony Quinn

data.quote: When I stopped playing hockey and started acting, the last person I was going to ask for help was my dad. He's the king of being like, 'I don't know. It's good work if you can get it. Good luck.'
data.author: Wyatt Russell

data.quote: According to my parents, I just started drumming when I was two. I traveled with them from five to seven on the road, playing percussion. Between 8 and 12, my dad sort of prepared me by teaching me every aspect of road life.
data.author: Questlove

data.author: Arnold H. Glasow

data.quote: This ought to be a season for cooperation in terms of pushing our economy forward, job creation, steadying the middle class, and laying the groundwork for a better future. And that's what we want to work on with Republicans and Democrats.
data.author: David Axelrod

data.quote: Ensuring a bright future for all our children is the responsibility of the community, the schools, families and like it or not- politicians as well.
data.author: Michael N. Castle

data.quote: I always felt like my future was at stake every time I stepped on stage and that was kind of hair-raising. At some point I just went, don't be frightened, you can't do anything wrong, it's your show.
data.author: Rickie Lee Jones

data.quote: In exile, I have tried to profit by the past and prepare for the future.
data.author: Lajos Kossuth

data.quote: In charting our course to the future, we are mindful of our path from the past.
data.author: Brad Henry

data.quote: We cannot win the future, expand the economy and spur job creation if we are saddled with increasingly growing deficits. That is why the president's budget is a comprehensive and responsible plan that will put us on a path toward fiscal sustainability in the next few years - a down payment toward tackling our challenges in the long term.
data.author: Jacob Lew

data.quote: I never think too far into the future. I'm too busy thinking about tomorrow's news.
data.author: Matt Drudge

data.quote: Everything born has to die, in order to make room for the future.
data.author: Joan D. Vinge

data.quote: A coldly rationalist individualist can deny that he has any obligation to make sacrifices for the future.
data.author: Garrett Hardin

data.quote: California has something which not every place in the world has: It has what I would call a sunny side, and I don't mean just physically, but the sunny side is a future. California's worth saving, to put it bluntly.
data.author: Nicolas Berggruen

data.quote: Find the beliefs that are strangling your feelings, challenge them for your sake as well as theirs, and see how it feels to love someone without a thought about the future, simply for who they are today.
data.author: Andrew J. Bernstein

data.quote: To some degree we all live with uncertainty. We have no control over the future. Yet we carry on, we persevere, because, I guess, it's the way we're made.
data.author: Karen Thompson Walker

data.quote: Most creative work is a process of people passing ideas and inspirations from the past into the future and adding their own creativity along the way.
data.author: Joichi Ito

data.quote: That future depends on the values of self-government, our sense of duty, loyalty, self-confidence and regard for the common good. We are a diverse country, and getting more diverse. And these virtues are what keep this great country together.
data.author: Jeff Miller

data.quote: I'm excited about what the future will bring and I think the best is yet to come.
data.author: Alonzo Mourning

data.quote: Hence, in desiring, the more the enjoyment is delayed, the more fancy begins to weave about the object images of future fruition, and to clothe the desired object with properties calculated to inflame the impulse.
data.author: Samuel Alexander

data.quote: The future is always beginning now.
data.author: Mark Strand

data.quote: America cannot turn its back on the economic future and women-owned businesses are part of that future.
data.author: Ruben Hinojosa

data.quote: Tomorrow is no man's gift.
data.author: Gilbert Parker

data.quote: The truth is, natural organisms have managed to do everything we want to do without guzzling fossil fuels, polluting the planet or mortgaging the future.
data.author: Janine Benyus

data.quote: The people of the future will say, meat-eaters in disgust and regard us in the same way that we regard cannibals and cannibalism.
data.author: Dennis Weaver

data.quote: I claim for Canada this, that in future Canada shall be at liberty to act or not act, to interfere or not interfere, to do just as she pleases, and that she shall reserve to herself the right to judge whether or not there is cause for her to act.
data.author: Wilfrid Laurier

data.quote: If you deliver excellence right now, that gives you the best shot at the best future you've got coming.
data.author: Robert Forster

data.quote: Any political party that undertakes to do it will, in God's name, be trampled, as it ought to be trampled, into the dust of condemnation, now and in the future.
data.author: Richard Parks Bland

data.quote: We owe it to the victims of the suicide bombers who struck London on 7 July 2005 to find out how the attacks happened and to learn the lessons that will spare lives in the future.
data.author: Pauline Neville-Jones

data.quote: We grow in time to trust the future for our answers.
data.author: Ruth Benedict

data.quote: You know when you're young you think you will always be. As you become more fragile, you reflect and you realize how much comfort can come from the past. Hymns can carry you into the future.
data.author: Andy Griffith

data.quote: The present moment is changing so fast that we often do not notice its existence at all. Every moment of mind is like a series of pictures passing through a projector. Some of the pictures come from sense impressions. Others come from memories of past experiences or from fantasies of the future.
data.author: Henepola Gunaratana

data.quote: There is no justifiable prediction about how the hypothesis will hold up in the future its degree of corroboration simply is a historical statement describing how severely the hypothesis has been tested in the past.
data.author: Robert Nozick

data.quote: Our awesome responsibility to ourselves, to our children, and to the future is to create ourselves in the image of goodness, because the future depends on the nobility of our imaginings.
data.author: Barbara Grizzuti Harrison

data.quote: A quality is something capable of being completely embodied. A law never can be embodied in its character as a law except by determining a habit. A quality is how something may or might have been. A law is how an endless future must continue to be.
data.author: Charles Sanders Peirce

data.quote: It's like real life: We don't get a preview of what's coming up, thank God, and we don't build our own character from what we're going to be informed with in the future.
data.author: Frances Conroy

data.quote: We all have a common goal, and we know it's all for our future good.
data.author: Marta Kristen

data.quote: To a father, when a child dies, the future dies; to a child when a parent dies, the past dies.
data.author: Red Auerbach

data.quote: The future isn't just a place you'll go. It's a place you will invent.
data.author: Nancy Duarte

data.quote: The Christian of the future will be a mystic or he will not exist at all.
data.author: Karl Rahner

data.quote: I do believe the most important thing I can do now is to help young people understand the past and prepare for the future.
data.author: John C. Stennis

data.quote: I'd say I'm a bit antimadridista although I do not know where my future will be, but it's a team that I never liked. I get the impression that it is an arrogant club, about how the players are. Without humility, you cannot get anywhere.
data.author: Isco

data.quote: The future is now.
data.author: Nam June Paik

data.quote: In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
data.author: Norodom Sihamoni

data.quote: The future is as bright as the promises of God.
data.author: William Carey
